Registers an 'Entity' in the 'EntityHandler'.
registerEntityHandler(EntityHandler) - Static method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Sets the 'EntityHandler' 'eh' as the current 'EntityHandler' for 'Entities'.
registerState(GameState, int) - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Registers the 'GameState' 'state' with the ID 'id', so it can be used by the 'Game'.
removeAll() - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Removes all 'Entities' from the 'EntityHandler'.
removeEntity(Entity) - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.
removeEntity(long) - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.
removeState(int) - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Removes the 'GameState' specified by the ID 'id' from the list of registered 'GameStates' so it is not usable anymore.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.entity.Entity
Renders the 'Entity' by calling the 'render()'-method for its 'Sprite'.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Calls the 'render'-method for every 'Entity' the 'EntityHandler' manages.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Calls the 'render()'-method for the currently active 'GameState'.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.GameState
Calls the 'render()'-method for all objects that need rendering to the screen.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.gfx.Sprite
Renders the 'Sprite' to the screen.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.gfx.SpriteSheet
Renders the whole 'SpriteSheet' to the screen.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.map.Map
Renders the whole 'Map' to the screen.
render(int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.lambda.map.Map
Renders a certain area of the 'Map' from (x, y) to (x + width, y + height) to the screen.
render(Rectangle) - Method in class com.lambda.map.Map
Renders the area of the 'Map' specified by the 'Rectangle' rec.
